Shaun White is an American professional snowboarder and skateboarder who is widely considered one of the most successful and influential snowboarders of all time. He is a three-time Olympic gold medalist and the first snowboarder to win gold medals at both the Winter Olympics and the Winter X Games.

Shaun White is an American professional snowboarder, skateboarder, and musician who has won three gold medals at the Winter Olympics. He is widely considered one of the most successful and influential snowboarders of all time.
